spinfo.tm.util

Class ReaderWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • spinfo.tm.util.ReaderWriter

  • public class ReaderWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for reading in data from given files and saving data to binary files.

    neumannm
